text: Pellet, Joomi mon ko Alla, On Taguɗo kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin e nder balɗe jeegoo, refti O fotondiri ka hoore Arsi. Himo suddira jemma on ñalorma, hiɗi ɗaɓɓindira no yaccorii. Naange ngen e lewru ndun e koode ɗen ko eltiraaɗi yamiroore Makko. Faamee ko Kanko heeranii tagu ngun e yamiroore nden. Mawnii mawngu Alla, Jeyɗo Winndere nden. @Corrected
